historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 47-446.

Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) repeal, see § 7008 of Fiscal Year 2010 Budget Support Second Emergency Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-207, October 15, 2009, 56 DCR 8234).

For temporary (90 day) repeal, see § 7008 of Fiscal Year Budget Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2009 (D.C. Act 18-260, January 4, 2010, 57 DCR 345).

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-17, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-441.

For Law 18-111, see notes following § 47-305.02.

DC CODE § 47-446

Current through December 11, 2012

title.text: Taxation, Licensing, Permits, Assessments, and Fees. (Refs & Annos)
